description.value:
Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or star system. Barely Held together cargo haulers, widespread and good for keeping a low profile. Conditions aren't the greatest, but it's one way to get somewhere specific with no questions asked.

Requirements

Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed

Effect: Average

Notes: 2000 T
